experts.bio_en: Professor of Civil Law and Islamic Jurisprudence at the University of Baghdad. Specializes in comparative legal studies between positive law and Islamic jurisprudence.
contributions: Head of Private Law Department at University of Baghdad (2015-2018)
Member of the Faculty Council of Law College
Participant in the Iraqi Constitution Review Committee

publications.title: Principles of Islamic Jurisprudence in Contemporary Iraqi Legislation
publications.venue: Journal of Law College - University of Baghdad

publications.title: Obligations and Contracts in Iraqi Civil Law

experts.bio_en: Assistant Professor of Public International Law at the University of Karbala since 2006. Holds a PhD in Public International Law (2018). Research focuses on counter-terrorism in international law and dispute settlement mechanisms.
contributions: Member of Iraqi Lawyers Association since 1993
Member of Iraqi Human Rights Society since 1998
Director of Legal Department at College of Agriculture, University of Karbala
Member of Karbala Provincial Council (2003-2006)

publications.title: Combating Terrorism in International Law and its Effectiveness in Iraq
publications.venue: PhD Dissertation - Islamic University of Lebanon

publications.title: Peaceful Means of International Dispute Settlement

documents.title: Curriculum Vitae - Prof. Dr. Khudhair Al-Ghannami

experts.bio_en: Assistant Professor specializing in legal research and constitutional law. Has particular interest in developing legal curricula in Iraq and studying comparative constitutional systems.
contributions: Member of the Legal Curriculum Development Team at Ministry of Higher Education
Research Associate at Center for Constitutional Studies
Legal Consultant for several NGOs

publications.title: Constitutional Review in Comparative Legal Systems

experts.bio_en: Assistant Professor specializing in International Law and International Humanitarian Law. Focuses on refugee and IDP issues, and international protection in conflict zones.
contributions: Legal Consultant for International Organization for Migration (IOM)
Lecturer in IHL courses for Red Cross
Member of Iraqi International Humanitarian Law Network

publications.title: Legal Protection of Internally Displaced Persons in Iraq

experts.bio_en: Assistant Professor in Legal Studies and Administrative Law. Research focuses on comparative administrative law and reform of administrative judiciary in Iraq.
contributions: Member of Judicial System Reform Committee in Kurdistan Region
Lecturer at Judicial Institute
Administrative Consultant for several government departments

publications.title: Administrative Judiciary in Iraq: Reality and Aspiration

experts.bio_en: Legal academic focusing on Public International Law, International Humanitarian Law, and Human Rights. Research interests include peace-building, women's rights, and minority protection.
contributions: Co-founder of Iraqi International Humanitarian Law Network
Local Expert in microfinance projects for International Monetary Fund
Member of Human Rights Committee at Ministry of Human Rights in Kurdistan Region
Co-founder of DKO Iraq Expertise House

publications.title: Distinction between International Humanitarian Law and International Human Rights Law
Human Rights and International Humanitarian Law
Iraqi Women and Vision of Peace in Iraq according to UN Standards
publications.venue: Journal of Law and Politics College - Kirkuk

documents.title: Curriculum Vitae - Dr. Nagham Ishaq Zia
